profileAlternative.name: Swathi Nambiar
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer 2 at eBay
profileAlternative.summary:
A passionate technology enthusiast with Master’s in Computer Science degree and 2+ years of industry experience. I like to learn and keep myself paced with the current technologies and I love to solve real world problems.

I possess good knowledge in OOPs, Security, Big data and Machine Learning concepts. Having worked in a fast paced customer support team, I have learnt the importance of being a great team member and delivering results within deadlines.

aboutAlternative.text:
A passionate technology enthusiast with Master’s in Computer Science degree and 2+ years of industry experience. I like to learn and keep myself paced with the current technologies and I love to solve real world problems.

I possess good knowledge in OOPs, Security, Big data and Machine Learning concepts. Having worked in a fast paced customer support team, I have learnt the importance of being a great team member and delivering results within deadlines.

positions.title: Software Engineer 2, Quality
positions.description:
Responsible for designing and implementing automation using Java, selenium, testNg.
Worked on several cross-functional applications within eBay while building a team and leading/ guiding people onsite and offshore.
Experimented and implemented new solutions to improve processes.
Played a DevOps role by implementing CI/CT/CD for my team.
Worked on UI/ API/ native mobile automation for AI driven applications.

positions.title: Engineering Intern
positions.description:
Mobile App Risk Management & Data Security
Designed a workflow, implemented and tested (over a secure and insecure network) a new feature from the scratch for the Appthority Android application to detect man-in-the-middle attacks for the network. The new version of application was rolled out in December ...

positions.title: Associate Software Engineer
positions.description:
Worked for APTRA Activate CIT and Support teams.
Experience in financial domain on an SST platform observing CEN XFS standards, source control being SVN as both a developer and tester in a fast-paced team that dealt with high priority customer issues....

positions.title: Digital Forensic Analyst
positions.description: Had been trained as an ASCL certified Digital Evidence Analyst ASCL (Asian School of Cyber Laws) specializing in Cyber Security. Imparted Training on Cyber Crime Investigation and Digital Evidence Analysis at various prestigious schools and colleges across South India.

given.text:
As a product manager, it was a delight to work with Swathi. She is collaborative, a great problem-solver, and gives honest and thoughtful feedback. As an example, we co-developed a process to ensure quality in our natural language machine learning models with every training update, which significantly decreased the intent recognition accuracy problems we saw before.

She's a great add to any technical team! See less

Swathi has always been powerhouse of energy and focused on whatever she did . She always focused to complete every activity on time and with perfect quality . I found her to be very professional, thoughtful, motivated and always prepared for challenges . She is a great team player . Moreover she's got great presentation skills which helps teams to understand new ideas or frame them in the best way . She's definitely an outstanding asset for any organization! See less

Swathi worked on my team as a Forensic expert. Swathi is hardworking and a very knowledgeable. She worked the long hours and always kept her enthusiasm and her focus even in the face of dire odds. A worthy team member and a great colleague!

items: Information security via Machine Learning Algorithms
Static and Dynamic analysis of Android Application to detect Malware
Email Spam classification using Naïve Bayes
Big Data technology to analyse Manufacturing device sensor data
A selective approach to Image Spam Detection
